product_name: Nathan TradRad Runner's Beanie with LEDs - Men's
long_description: Run in low light and be seen with the Nathan TradRad Runner's beanie. Built-in front and rear LED lights keep you highly visible, while stretch fleece helps keep you cozy when temps dip.
short_description: Run in low light and be seen with the Nathan TradRad Runner's beanie. Built-in front and rear LED lights keep you highly visible, while stretch fleece helps keep you cozy when temps dip.
